scripts.release: npm run clean && npm install && lerna publish from-package --exact --force-publish=unmock-core --include-merged-tags
scripts.postinstall: lerna run prepare && npm run lint-ts && npm run compile:tests && npm run compile
scripts.lint-ts: npm run format-check && tslint --project packages/unmock-types/ --config tslint.json && tslint --project packages/unmock-xmlhttprequest/ --config tslint.json && tslint --project packages/openapi-refinements/ --config tslint.json && tslint --project packages/unmock/tsconfig.node.json --config tslint.json && tslint --project packages/unmock/tsconfig.browser.json --config tslint.json && tslint --project packages/unmock-cli/ --config tslint.json && tslint --project packages/unmock-core/ --config tslint.json && tslint --project packages/unmock-jest/ --config tslint.json && tslint --project packages/unmock-node/ --config tslint.json && tslint --project packages/unmock-server/ --config tslint.json && tslint --project packages/unmock-browser/ --config tslint.json
scripts.lint-ts-fix: npm run format && tslint --fix --project packages/unmock-types/ --config tslint.json && tslint --fix --project packages/unmock-xmlhttprequest/ --config tslint.json && tslint --fix --project packages/openapi-refinements/ --config tslint.json && tslint --fix --project packages/unmock/tsconfig.node.json --config tslint.json && tslint --fix --project packages/unmock/tsconfig.browser.json --config tslint.json && tslint --fix --project packages/unmock-cli/ --config tslint.json && tslint --fix --project packages/unmock-core/ --config tslint.json && tslint --fix --project packages/unmock-jest/ --config tslint.json && tslint --fix --project packages/unmock-node/ --config tslint.json && tslint --fix --project packages/unmock-server/ --config tslint.json && tslint --fix --project packages/unmock-browser/ --config tslint.json
